metadata.comments: This playbook will send a weekly Security Score briefing obtaining 15 subs per time chart
metadata.author: Nathan Swift

inputs.body:
Subscriptions_CL
| extend Subscription = displayName_s 
| distinct Subscription, SubscriptionId
| serialize Num = row_number()

Subscriptions_CL
| extend Subscription = displayName_s 
| summarize Subs=dcount(Subscription)

SecureScoreControls_CL
| extend SubscriptionId = tostring(split(id_s, "/", 2)[0]), SecurityControl = properties_displayName_s
| where properties_score_max_d != 0
| join kind = leftouter (Subscriptions_CL) 
on $left.SubscriptionId == $right.SubscriptionId
| summarize by Subscription = displayName_s, ScorePercent = round((round(properties_score_current_d, 0)*100)/properties_score_max_d, 0), SecurityControl
| where ScorePercent != 100
| sort by Subscription asc , ScorePercent desc

body.Body:
Security Score weekly briefing



Daily trending secure score by subscription - Are you trending down ? Review unhealthy Security Control details

Remediate unhealthy resources under Security Controls
Implement SecureDevOps Kit for Azure , design and deploy securely


@{variables('img1')}


@{variables('img2')}


UnHealthy SecurityControl Rankings

@{base64ToString(body('SecureScoreRankingsViz')?['attachmentContent'])}
body.Subject: Security Score weekly briefing |  @{body('PastDateFormat')} - @{body('CurrentDateFormat')}

inputs.body:
SecureScore_CL
| extend ScorePrecent = round((round(properties_score_current_d, 0)*100)/properties_score_max_d, 0), SubscriptionId = strcat(split(id_s, '/')[2])
| join kind = leftouter (Subscriptions_CL) 
on $left.SubscriptionId == $right.SubscriptionId
| summarize by Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd-MM-yyyy'), ScorePrecent, Subscription = displayName_s
| sort by Subscription asc 
| serialize Num = row_number()
| where Num between (@{variables('sublowcounter')} .. @{variables('subhighcounter')})
